meanings.definition: A small hot-tasting pod of a variety of capsicum, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some chillies to the curry for extra spice.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a pinch of chillies to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent3: The chillies in the stew turned up the heat more than expected!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of chillies, spreading warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red color of the chillies made the dish look irresistible.

meanings.definition: A hot-tasting powder made from dried and ground chillies.
meanings.sent1: Sprinkling a bit of chillies on top of the pizza gave it a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: The chillies powder added a fiery flavor to the salsa.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally sneezed after inhaling the chillies powder!
meanings.sent4: The music was like a sprinkle of chillies, adding excitement to the party.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chillies powder filled the kitchen with a tantalizing scent.
